resources.string: 1.How many regular meals a day (With sadza/rice/potatoes or any other source of starch) does the household typically eat?
2.What are the main sources of livelihood for the household?
3.What is the average monthly remittances the household received from relatives or others during the last 12 months ?
4.What percentage of your income goes to rent and rates?
7.How many rooms are used for sleeping?
8.What type of fuel does your household normally use for cooking?
10.What is the tenure status of the household?
Natural or rudimentary (pole and dagga, makeshift,wood, cardboard, or metal?
11.Does the household possess any of the following assets:Radio,television,refrigerator,bicycle,motorcycle,car or truck?
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
